column3: “Although this strain is an energizing sativa with happy and euphoric effects, it is still unlike many other sativas. Instead of a fast hitting, heavy head high, Jack the Ripper eases you into a powerful stone not overwhelmed by excessive head heaviness. As a person with constant medium to high levels of anxiety, I can tell you instead of producing high levels of anxiety and paranoia like a wide amount of sativa strai...”

“Absolutely fantastic sativa! One of the best strains if had in the past 10 years. The high THC content will knock your socks off and the high lasts for 3-4 hours solid. I have brain cancer so I deal with different health issues such as pain, and this strain works extremely well controlling pain, nausea, and vertigo. The bud is covered in beautiful crystals and smells like straight up skunk! It is right up there with ...”

“35y/o male European and Native American descent, O negative blood, no allergies. Fasted for 16+ hours. Vaped ground flower from a plenty vaporizer @ around 380 degrees Fahrenheit. 

Mood before medicating: good not great, fair mood, I'd say, I'm in bed with a hurt knee so that should say how I feel right there. 

I've smoked nearly an 1/8th of Jack the Ripper, which I consider enough times to give a fair review. The ...”

“Shit got me feeling ripped to pieces what a beautiful mess haha its great tho' got me enjoying everything around me at the Present time shit what a gift we have to have to be alive today and see the ones we love again awake and living. Lets remember  to keep the memory of those who have past before us stay alive in our present time. Respects to the most high,OneLove.”

“Alright so I have to say this. When this is grown right, it is amazing, but really intense! If you have a low tolerance, then you might want to limit yourself. I smoked some of this out of 1 joint with my buddy and about 1 or 2 hits from a bong and I was higher than I've ever been. Definite feelings of euphoria and munchies, eliminates pain, makes you think a lot, can be a really good high if taken in moderation. Pic...”

“Genetics:  Hybrid-Pluton X Purple Haze X Lambsbread X NL X Jack Herer X Romulan X Cindy99BCGA

Smell: Really sweet, like a piece of fresh juicy fruit gum or a tart candy. It has a very sweet aromatic pungency that smells like a candy store with a very soft scent of ganja. 

Taste: Like lemon haze with a hash undertone and cotton candy on the exhale. 
 
Buzz Type: Intense, trippy, visual, phase shifting increase...”

“Heightened sense of insight. My high was calm , and full of epiphanies, philosophical contemplation, and analytical creativity.
Great for Philosophy and Art class.”
“Couch lock killer.”
“This was a very tasty smoke. Citrusy and sweet.  Almost makes the crazy neighbors upstairs screaming at each other tolerable.  Happy Holidays!”

“I got seriously ripped off JTR. She immediately ripped through my brain enhancing colors while bending my mind into a creative, cerebral concoction of uplifting bliss. When grown right this bud is straight dynamite. The smell is a very sharp, peppery, citrus musk with intense pungency. I found it great for creativity, elevating the body and mind, depression, fatigue, appetite and nausea”

“Everyone has that strain they love and they love every strain it's mixed with.  That's how I feel about Jack The Ripper. For the longest time I couldn't find it but I kept finding strains that had JTR as one of the parent strains. Every single one I had I loved. Here are just a few some are even indicas. Agent Orange, 9 pound hammer, strawberry daiquiri, Mickey's Kush, and Jesus OG. I know there's a couple I'm forget...”

“Got it in the weekend. Smells awesome. Smokes great. The high really creeps up on you, and when it hits it most definitely hits. Makes me kinda talkative...at least more than other strains. Good shit.”
“made me so happy and giggly”

“I absolutely love this strain, completely covered in keif and has an amazing smell. I find this strain most helpful if you need to focus or just hang out, but my favorite use of this strain is ​amazing appetite suppression abilities, I feel hungry but then I eat a little bit and I feel full”
“Very unique and pleasurable taste to it. It reminds me of blue dreams but with a stronger effect. Definitely gonna try it again when I get my hands on it.”

“I stumbled upon this strain and I must say I am very pleased with it in every area. With a very citrusy scent out of the bag, when burned gives off a strong earthy scent. Upon smoking one hand-pipe bowl I could feel the effects in full force, I felt alert and focused with no paranoia or stress. Great strain, would recommend for the daily medicine user.”
“For all of my life I've had muscle spasms and I've been seen by many different doctors that have prescribed all sorts of medications to alleviate the symptoms" of having muscle spasms. Well
column4: nothing worked. Then I discovered medical cannabis and really wanted to see and feel what everyone had been talking about. A couple dispensaries later with all sorts of different types of cannabis to medicate with

column3: “I stumbled upon this strain and I must say I am very pleased with it in every area. With a very citrusy scent out of the bag, when burned gives off a strong earthy scent. Upon smoking one hand-pipe bowl I could feel the effects in full force, I felt alert and focused with no paranoia or stress. Great strain, would recommend for the daily medicine user.”
“This is an awesome medicine for those with Depression, Anxiety, ADD, ADHD Super spacey, in the clouds, but focused and happy! Great medicine and puts a SMILE on your face :)”

“DO NOT smoke if you are having bad anxiety. I had some stress about life, mostly from a girl and this strain messed with my head so bad. It amplified all my fears till I broke down in a massive panic attack. Just be careful on this one.”

“Love this strain. There's a small buzz for about 10 to 20 minutes then the medicated feeling starts strong in the head relieving any stress, anxiety, depression and guides the thought process into a more peaceful and meditative state. I would explain this strain as mellow happy". Really gets one to start living in the present.”"

“Went Picked this up from Clear Choice Collective in Tacoma Lakewood, WA Area. I liked it.. I travelled the wood's here in this rain forest type park area. Seemingly thing's got quite scary around these times of smoking my girlfriend came upon 666 3x's in 1 day at work with FXO. I felt like blurting thing's out lately I cannot keep a secret right now. I do have some anxiety. That might be because i just ran out of thi...”

“I use it for its high THCV and it works. I eat less, get more done and I am in less pain. I prefer to vape it using Golden Extracts or The CO2 Company. it is NOT good if you want to sleep, eat or be in couch lock. It IS good if you want a daytime energizing strain that you can stuff done on and have a good head high. I also recommend Cherry Pie and Durban Poison if Jack the Ripper works for you.”

“Jack the Ripper feels like a heavy dose that seems to not really kick in until moments later, it just almost put me to sleep in bright day light. A nice strain, to use for stress and daily doses of .5 to .1 for the moderate user.”

“This strain was really nice, although it is a Sativa, I found that it was making me sleepier than some of my indicas, I felt for me personally this is not a strain I would want to go to work or socialize with people who I should not be high in front of.

I would definitely say this is more of a play games or watch movies type of strain, I personally just don't feel it's a day time strain for myself but others have go...”

“JTR is a delightful strain perfectly suited for day-time use. The effects are quick to onset, ripping through the mind with an uplifting euphoria, leaving the user in a state of bliss. The heady effects of this strain seem to be concentrated in the forehead and neck, but a subtle feeling of relaxation is noticeable throughout the body. A particularly aromatic strain which will fill the room with a bold citrus scent, ...”

“Skunky, medium vape, but lingers for a bit. Has a sweet citrus smell, leafy buds but can be compact. Nice happy thoughts while the stress goes away and my energy comes back. Visually laggyness, bright colors seem to pop more, clear headed. Great for pain hunger or energy recommend it for sativa vacations. Very dry mouth and eyes not so much the paranoia or dizziness. Would be better if the taste was so skunky. I like...”
“This strain just makes me feel relaxed and happy as hell without gettng tired or jittery.  It is my favorite weekend daytime strain and social strain.”

“First off, I don't review anything, EVER. So this is the first. If this strain doesn't already have a widely known nickname, it should be called The Video Game Strain." The laser like focus that I achieved was absolutely PHENOMENAL for doing some online gaming. COD
column5: you name it. And if you enjoy puzzles games
column6: this is it man. It definitely helps me focus more on tasks at hand
column7: I'd give it a 10 if coul...”"

column3: “All my friends agreed that this weed makes you high as shit!" it is definitely a thought provoking strain amd makes you feel good. I suggest smoking from a bong.”"
“Amazing 🍋 taste. Nice lasting. Similar to super lemon Haze”
“Amazing, has a sweet citrus smell and a strong, long lasting high. Generally a good time, was definitely a massive body and mind buzz, really warm throughout my whole body. Amazing weed.”
“All my friends agreed that this weed makes you high as shit!" it is definitely a thought provoking strain amd makes you feel good. I suggest smoking from a bong.”"

column3: “JTR gets a A+ for being an energy booster. But it’s a heavy body high for me and I’m more of a “head” high type of girl. First time I smokes JTR I couldn’t feel my feet. 😩.”
“Ever this about becoming a buddhist monk?  This is how they do it.  This shit will bring you closer to God.”

“Nice stuff, far from my favorite but still not bad. Not at all sedating, but not really stimulanting either. GREAT for meditation. Has a bit of a psychedelic feeling to it. I smoked a whole gram of it in one day, haha. Did not make me anxious at ALL, unlike some other sativas do. Extremely nice smell, very lemon-y and strong.”
“All my friends agreed that this weed makes you high as shit!" it is definitely a thought provoking strain amd makes you feel good. I suggest smoking from a bong.”"

“Met Jack for the first time today -- and everything I'd heard was true about this one.. very lemon-y scent, however piney on the inhale/uptake.. exhale provides major rushes of euphoria, plus major relief of chronic pain while stress and pressure melt away. I got surprisingly mellow and introspective for a sativa, but easily kicked it into gear when necessary. Jack may be bipolar, but it is to the consumer's advantag...”

needless to say my partner loves my nightly routine of toking up after work, putting on my headphones and cleaning house. 

leaves me creative and talkative,  ready to write or draw or unpack the deeper musters of life. also a great medicine for going out dancing. Jack really just wants you to get your groove on no ...”

“Okay, this is an update on a previous review. Really had a good chance to judge Jack the Ripper just now and WOW. To build some background I'm a daily smoker, wake and bake and smoke all day kind of guy. I waited until 1pm to smoke on an empty stomach. I packed a pre rolled RAW cone and went for it. Focusing on the effects: the high came on as previously mentioned, a very clear high. Then all of a sudden it was just ...”

“The worst strain I have ever tried. Very dirty high. I tried it two times both with amazingly weird results. It's almost in the category of 'its so bad it's good'. Truly a strain that has earned its name. I see a lot of people saying it isn't for new smokers and I agree and just want to add that it isn't for anyone and it's a sh*t strain.

First time I smoked it, it was too much. Made it very hard to get over the buz...”
“Quick high, very uplifting; one of the best sativas that we have sampled!  Highly recommend it!”

“One of my all time Favorites  Jack The Ripperrrrrrrr made by one of Washingtons finest breeders!!! One of TGA Subcools best genetics to date and if you can fine the ultra rare Pink Lemonade Phenotype you are in for a spectacular treat! The standard more readily available phenotype of JTR is fantastic as well! A citrus sweet 70% sativa that has a wonderful Jacks Cleaner high. Very few Washington recreational producers...”

First time I smoked it, it was too much. Made it very hard to get over the buz...”

“great sativa for being productive. Smoke in the morning, get all house work done, cook, smoke again, and then feast. Its a very subtle yet strong high where you can do anything but you enjoy it because you are hire than a fucking kite”
“A super chill strain, though pretty sedating.”
“Certainly an above average sativa dominant hybrid.  An 8.5 for me.”
“Took a dab of shatter before Biology class. Was very engaged and everything was actually interesting.”

“a Sativa with a twist. she smells lemony with hints of Pineapple.  sweet. tastes lemony and hits quite quickly. I couldn't shut up talking and when left alone my voice carried on in my head. feel alert and energized and then after an hour boom i was ready for bed. not many sativas do that to me. felt really hungry when I woke up to. buds are light green and spongy dense like.”
“This stuff is seriously strong smelling, tasting and knocks you for six! Loooovvveee the lemony smell and taste. Definite creeper, but with a name like that it's got to be :) 9 out of 10”
“Just, yes.”

“A bicycle is dangerous to pedal outside of approved zones (with your headphones on...)
If you listen to a lot of music through headphones
This strain will have you bringing out the turntable
And your fastest Pitchfork Metal Band 
Former Long Distance Lung Cancer Patients might appreciate the minimal (residual & activity based) heart-pressure (elevated density of sedation) versus Solemnity and Jarring Upswings of Sati...”

“As a person with anxiety, panic disorder and PTSD I was hoping for a happy high but ended up having a panic attack. Tried a second time with same result. I would just caution anyone already with anxiety on this bad boy.”

column5: had a headache and completely cured it. 9 out of 10 for this beauty!”"

column3: “Clean and energetic.  Great for all day.”

“Smoked this strain via a bong and with raw papers. Had a delicious smell and taste. Smoked evenly in both a bowl and wrapped up. Ground well and fluffy. 

I haven't smoked a lot lately so this strand seemed to hit me harder than most. However, I was feeling euphoric and energetic as the page suggests. 

Also, I'm not sure how helpful this is, but I felt extremely paranoid for a while during me session. Convinced myse...”

“A cross between Jack's Cleaner and Space Queen this strain has natural uplifting tendencies. Often described as potent and fast acting. The blended aroma of lemon and pineapple that wafts from its resin-heavy buds is carried over to its taste as well, and its subtle relaxation does not dampen the motivation one expects from a Sativa-dominant hybrid.”

I like to go real heavy on an indica bho and than level off with a blunt of JTR and...”

“Definitely a great strain that has a lot to give. It is a creeper for sure. At first I thought I was getting high, but then I waited it out and snap there you go, you have a eureka moment and you're blown. Has nice orange hairs, with a decent amount of trichomes on the the leaves. Decent looking strain, not anything special, but still dank. Sativa dominant will have you thinking. Smooth hitter, even out of a simple p...”

“A super chill strain, though pretty sedating.”
“This strain was a good beginners high. It made me feel like the bunny mascot from Energizer Batteries.”

“I'm pretty cerebral and active and prefer sativas. This here is nice: it came on slow. I hit my pipe a couple of times, took a little break, then hit it again. The high rolled in like a big wave of light water. I feel brilliant, euphoric. This is great for my depression, and it energizes me -- gives me not only ideas but the energy to make them happen. I can't see trying to take a nap right now; this isn't a bedtime ...”
“actually added moisturizer to dry contact eyes.  good for caffeine headachs.”

“Me and my buddy picked some of this up, and the first thing we noticed was that the smell wasn't very strong, it had a citrousy and lemony scent that was rather pleasant.  We took it for a run with a 1-hitter and 2 packs each and we were up up and away.  Excellent long lasting high, I must say that I felt very energetic, and free of stress. Great stuff!”
“Knocked me off my ass and onto my couch.”
“Killer weed!!,pefect for relaxing during the night.”
“It makes me really HAPPY!!!!!”
“Nice easy smoke. Earthy taste, with not too many bad things to say. Really rippin this shit”
“this one is good. good heady feel that doesn't slow you down!!!”
“Awesome aroma and flavor. This is definitely killer cannabis for a reason. Provides an instant head buzz and body high that leaves you in a couch lock”
“Gives a real chill or laid back feel.”
“This strain makes me feel creative and energetic then mellows out to nice buzz and relaxation.”
“Great strain, great high just didn't seem to last very long”
“This strain is definitely one of my favorites. Hits hard and smells wonderful.”
“OK. I think I'd rather just smoke Jack Herer.”

“I like the smell , the smoke is a little harsh . The high is not as energetic of a high as with Jack Herer. Still not that bad . Good to smoke and drive or do physical, critical or analytical tasks .”
“One of my all time favorites. I use the Co2 cartridge. Nice lemon flavor, great mellow.”
“Great scent, great taste, great high! Every time I smoke JTR it's a great experience and a great uplifting high, while smoking it is also very enjoyable because of the great smooth taste.”
“This strain has a great taste and is pretty smooth going in. Very pleasant and great for relaxation and calm-mindedness.”
“Not my favorite. Very buzzy" head high
column4: comes with a side of irritable paranoia.”"

column3: “It's great my favorite sativa is j1 but this is definitely number 2. It helped me sort through my depression by making my thoughts feel less impactful. Plus it's great for listening to music and reading”
“Good daytime herb, a bit of a creeper on me but it had good flavor and duration.”

“I am very pleased with this strain from my local access point! It has one of my favorite strains in its genetics: Jack's Cleaner. You can smell the pine sol odor and taste it as well. Also a very deep fruity, piney smell to this strain. This particular batch has incredible looking buds - very dense, tight, bud COVERED in crystals just begging to be enjoyed. Tiny wisps of red hairs extend throughout, but not too much....”

“Very excellent smoke, not too harsh. Tastes pretty smooth, not too tasty though, this is a definite creeper, hits you at least 7 minutes after a bowl. But you definitely feel it. Very cerebral, straight to the dome”
“The high took a minute to kick in but once it did I felt great and I was focused and energetic enough to tackle anatomy and physiology homework great great great”

“Although it tasted good especially for a citrus flavored extract. I didn't find anything special about this strain. Yeah it did the trick but had to go through a larger quantity in order for that trick to be  apparent that it was being taken care of... (sorry if this review is mangled High AF from sweet tooth atm... but yeah J.T.R. did mildly help with pain and also allowed my sped up bipolar mind to relax so I guess...”
“Very nice high, creative juices started flowing right away. No anxiety. Will put this strain on my favorites list”
“Tastie happy head recomend for daytime;-)”

“I am normally not a Sativa person, but I was offered a couple grams of this strain, and I heard so many awesome things that I couldn't resist. This sweet and lemony strain is a heavy hitting sativa, gives me a huge uplifting and energetic high. Although some Haze strains have been known to give me slight paranoia, this strain did not. Definitely recommended for anyone who needs a nice mood lifter and a burst of energ...”
“Good strain with nice relaxing high”
“an awesome strain. its one of the first ones I tried. Got real strong lemon smell with a citrus taste.”
“very tasty saliva dominant strain smoked some bud through a spoon pipe and was high for a decent period of time while I gamed great strain and would def recommend”

“It's excellent to smoke in the morning with the whole day stretched out in front of you. The first few hours are filled with nothing but relaxation and dry mouth remedies. When it passes you're up and ready to go, completely motivated. A seriously incredible high the first time you smoke this strain.”
“One of my favorites. A great creative sativa.”
“Kinda gassy”

“This is my favorite strand sativa wise. I only need a few hits to be overly high. I find it messes with my depth perception quite significantly. Makes me very thoughtful, I like to smoke this while journaling even. 
This is a great one if you are sleepy, it wakes you up just enough to be comfortable. Just all over great.”
“very pungent smell, dank, good daytime bud, able to focus with a clear head that's buzzing, energizing as well”
“Mellow flavor with a hidden bang, we're talking grassy knoll hidden. People are still talking about it. Overall good head high and a creeper.”
“Great strain. Amazing taste. Only downfall is I feel the high doesn't last long unless you smoke a lot. But small buds do have a lot in them when ground up.”
“Great for those who like to study high!”
“Thoroughly enjoyed this uplifting strain. Still feel the munchies, though it is easier to resist.”
“I like the weed”
“Creeps up on you like a guy that walks into the street, looks right then gets hit by a bus.”
“Smells very much of Lemon/Lime. Most certainly puts you in a relaxed state of mind.”
“actually added moisturizer to dry contact eyes.  good for caffeine headachs.”
“nice strain”
“Really good strain defiantly a keeper..”

“not really the biggest fan,  but definitely a good strain.  tastes and smells awesome,  like lemon pine sol in a way.  definitely a cough to get off strain,  and for a sativa, knocks you out with a quickness if u get to comfy. more psycho active than anything,  not great for pain,  but will make you laugh and crash pretty hard”

“I will not lie about this strain. My absolute favorite because it will hit you hard after you get done smoking! People who have tried other sativa will say they get that head high feeling yes you still get it but you get a lot of happiness out of it and you feel good! I recommend people to try it but beginners best of luck!!”
“delious !!  thank you Nichole !!   happy, happy joy, joy !!”

“Before I went on a run my friend wanted to smoke, so he said this strain was good for energy. So after we smoked I started my run, and on my running app it said I ran 8 miles at a 6.5 minutes (average time) so I highly recommend this for energy uses.”
“if you like good strong strains youl like this”
“crush a bit, lil bit, roll it up, take a hit”

“This is some of THE best tasting, long lasting that I have run into for quite some time!  I love it, and it also helps with my chronic knee pain. 
It has kind of a 3 stage high to it!
I highly recommend it.”

“A very curious flower, smells of baked goods. A very dense scent. The smoke was the same; a very bready dense smoke. No distinct flavors to note, may just be me. The high was a mild stone but clarifying mentally. Like my brain was sleepy from a hot shower.  Decent dope.”
“its just a good strain, good looking bud i enjoyed this strain”
“Wow, just wow. That's quite a strain. Fantastic head high with a bit of body as well. Very euphoric, makes your mind go astray in a good way.”
“Got this strain at Freedom Farmers in San Diego. Very nice effects, very smooth smoke, and they had a great price on it! oh yea, and the batch I received had been rolled in kief!! Bonus!”

“Top Shelf! Tastes great..no fertilizer.   Jack has an incredible smell and is quite the creeper.  Working great today for a migraine, stress and anxiety. Best overall strain I've found in the valley.”
“My hubby picked some of this up. It's a very satisfying sativa, even if I can't recall anything unique about it. Very high quality.”
“Not crazy about this one... Or any lemony strains. Not my favorite flavor in smoke”
“overall great strain. smoked a bowl and I was gone; high was intense. I would recommend this strain for those who need something during the daylight.”
“grew this strain one time. beautiful, sticky buds and a smooth, uplifting high. grew really well in an indoor environment,too.”
“Great Strain for the day time, but makes my eyes really dry and itchy.”
“Really good”

“Jack the Ripper listed as a sativa dominate hybrid with total cannabinoids of 30.6 and converted THC at 25.8%  Made by Heavenly Buds. The flavor is a new and interesting one for me. I get a lemon flavor with a gas middle and earthy finish. The effect is uplifted, happy, and easily distracted, while giving a radiating energy around the chest. Unique feeling and low anxiety from this strain would smoke again.”
“It's one of the best strains out on a global scale!”

“Got a pre-roll of this as a bonus from a new dispensary.  Smoked about half of it with a friend.  Got the giggles so bad I thought I'd have a stroke.  We kept getting lost.  It was great.  Fantastic high.  9/10, would recommend.  PS Seriously, don't drive with this stuff.”

“Two good rips and I was feeling very elevated, focused and deep. Thoughts free-flowing but not overwhelming. Watched a good 2 hour documentary in the evening and now, 2.5 hours after medicating I've come down very smoothly.”

“JTR-Grown with Pro Mix and Advanced Nutrients- Smells like citrus pinesol. A blend of grapefruit, orange, and chemical. The buds are medium sized, dense with a long narrow shape. Light green with frosty white trichs and orange hairs. The effects of the strain are speedy almost hyper, clear headed with a medium body high. (Hallucinations available in high doses.) This strain makes people talkative and social. Smells a...”

“Jack descendant for sure but a little sweeter smelling. Upbeat high that creeps and lasts. Motivating but the type of stuff you start out doing something then realize you've wasted an hour getting ready to do something, not realizing quite how high you were. Fun, sneaky strong strain. 4.5/5.”
“Jack kicked my ass. 👍🏻”
“A very chatty strain! Got lost in an economic discussion before realizing it was way past my bedtime...still very alert, if you dose on the lighter side, but quite relaxing”
“This strain is now one of my overall favorites. great buy at $100 half.”
“I was very uppidy. Gave me energy and made me happy :)”
“It makes me really HAPPY!!!!!”

“Now I've only tried Jack the Ripper once, but it was quite memorable. The effect lasts a decent amount of time, and the taste is something different all together. Not bad, but it's different. The only thing I noticed about this strain is the headache I got from coming down from a high from Jtr. It was probably the most memorable part about smoking it. Since I only smoked this strain once, I can't say for sure that th...”

“First strain I grew and first time I felt pain free and happy in more than 10 years.  

Cannot seem to find this strain anywhere now.”
“love it”

“Nice, but not heavy head high. Relaxed non-racy feel for a Sativa for me. Kind of hits quick and falls off quickly. Nice soreness relief after a long swim, but still giving me good energy. Great! A 5 star has to wow me, this was close 4.25. And my first review, which should tell you something.”
“Nice lemon smell nd a great day tyme bud I smoke the wax nd that's killer”

“Stopped in for Durban at Cannacopia, but inquired about their deals. Bud tender opened the jar and the Jack came through on the first inhale. 20 an eight sealed the deal.  Wonderful evening smoke for us Sativa nuts.”
“I feel clear, motivated, happy and ripped.  A great combo.”
“This strain leaves you with an intense body high and a feeling of overall well being. Really great for stress relief and creative thinking. The only drawback is the noticeable paranoia.”
“one of the first buds I tried cuz of the name. most definitely a killer strain.”
“My absolute favorite for doing a 180 on my mood!!”
“Mellow giggly high. Looked good, smelled good, smoked good.”
“heady. light. meditative.”
“Great sativa! The taste of this bud is amazing another great tga strain!”
“this is by far my fave citrus flave Mary Jane. delicious taste and effect, can you ask for more?”
“I've been looking for this strain again for a while, if anyone has any around Tucson AZ reply please, ill pay whatever”

“This is one of the strains I would keep on hand at all times. Like many others described the slow creeper is what I love. Very tasty strain strong lemons and pine sol with a bit of a spice that some say is tough on lungs. TGA has awesome genetics love the work they do.”

“This strain is defiantly a good one, mostly a cerebral high. I felt creative, euphoric, motivated and it barely made my eyes red only downside is when I  first started smoking this it would make my eyes really sore but after a few times it doesn't do that anymore. The high lasted about 2 hours for me.”
“Sooooo AMAZING!! It's great at making a 180° on a bad mood. Everything is wonderful and I feel very creative. It's a pretty clear headed high as well.”

“In your looking to be couch locked and loaded for the night with nothing but a brick on your head then this is not the strain for you. Very uplifting and get stuff done type of strain. If you like a nice lemon flavor with a pinch of citrus then look no further. One of the best sativa's I've had the pleasure of smoking.”
“wonderful smell, tastes great, decent potentcy”
“All this did was make me incredibly hungry, paranoid, and extremely anxious. Never again.”
“Taste like pledge cleaner haha very great taste and decent high but got a lil old after awhile. Have had it quite a bit”

“Jack the Ripper is my daily daytime buddy! After a long & rough 2018, Jack was the only thing that got me out of bed. It helped with my sever Anxiety and Depression. It helped me process traumatic events in my life that left with PTSD. It helped me focus through my work day better than any ADHD meds could. And even in heartbreak it helped fill the void and push me to new and better heights in my life!  Thank you, Jac...”

“Strong sativa, great if you’re in a lively environment (PHISH concert for example!) but it can make me feel wired and more irritable in the wrong setting. I enjoy it on occasion but usually just for a single hit.”

“Smoked two different grows of this strain, one grow gave me pretty bad anxiety, might have been due to how much of a creeper this strain is, didn't see it coming.. Second time around it made me feel great, very relaxed but energetic at the same time. Very good strain, however my eyes were bloodshot to hell, even after using eye drops, both times. And my eyes don't usually get very red. Makes me a little paranoid in p...”
“I've never experienced such a high like this one. Great strain”
“I tried this strain awhile back and it was an instant favorite. If you are looking for a strain to make you smile and laugh, this is one you should try!”

“The bud looks extremely mattered when you first see it, commonly people will point out the hilt lining like substances that spirals around the bud. 

The smell is that of a very pungent lemon must. If you only smelled this bud, you would think you had lemon haze, however the mustiness can be the best indicator of the smell. 

JtR smokes like an absolute champion. This is one of the best strains  of marijuana in m...”
“If you haven't tried it, do so. If you have tried it, you already know.”
“I have seen way better sativa dominant mixes this strain is overrated”
“From the first hit to the last it had a citrus like taste and lots of resin. It was perfect though and just what I love in a strain.”

“So good! A classic, energetic, cerebral sativa high. The taste is mild and lemony, a very pleasant vape. Happiness & euphoria hit me almost immediately, and I'm in a high-energy state of mindful concentration. God I love ganja.”

“A wonderful sativa that hits with a slow burn. The high takes it’s time reaching your head, unlike most sativas, where you will usually have a defining moment in the high where you are clearly able to recognize the effects of the thc hitting you. This strain will definitely wake you up and give you plenty of energy for the next few hours, with the added benefit of staying clear headed throughout the high. The strain ...”
“Smooth and motivator assisting chores with a smile”
“low terpenes, gold amber, fair amount of coughing. Nice head high that hits pretty hard then slightly increases over about 15-20mins. Then has a nice quiet, and gradual decline. I enjoyed it.”
“I have nothing bad to say about this strain. It has a great smell and taste to it. The smoke was easy to draw and easy to get me stoned. Will def smoke again”
“I really love this strain for daytime. Has an amazing aroma and flavor, gives me a pow"! Right off the bat very uplifting and powerful head high
column4: happy and talkative ...it starts to mellow out slowly and become relaxing more and more over the next hour with a nice creative focus and then as it completely ebbs
column5: still able to get things done or easily rest and nap - neither impulse is overwhelming 😁

column3: “i love this strain the high set on super fast hits the head heavy then creeps down to the lower parts of your body really good talktive strain too”

“This strain is a pretty good high. But it KILLS your stomach. I barely smoked and it made me throw up or will just mess my stomach up and I won’t want to eat anything and just feel uncomfortable. I feel hype but still feel sick.”
“overall great strain. Smoked a bowl and I was gone; high was intense. I enjoyed my high. I would recommend this strain for those who need something during the daylight.”
“Love JTR!!!”

“Great daytime strain very upbeat and euphoric, there is an instant burst of energy and a crystal clear focus that makes this strain the perfect smoke when your dragging and need a little pick me up. The bud structure is very dense bright green in color absolutely sticky with resin and the smell of citrus and lemon really jump out whenever I crack open the jar. The upbeat euphoric nature of this strain may cause some ...”

“Jack the Ripper is one of my favorite Sativas. The high that I get from it perfect for daytime use. I always am on my A game when I have this handy. I'm completely focused throughout my day and ready to go. Love it!”

“Found it to be rather strong, in the sense that it knocked me to my knees.
Good spirited i was.
:)”

“Definitely one of my favorites. Was great for my pain, especially headaches. Was relaxing but I felt energetic from it. This is a great daytime strain. It's also good at night to chill with, ease anxiety while reading , talking to a friend or just watching a movie. The only down side is the pain relief effects and overall it just doesn't last as long as some other strains. However it's worth it, so I still gave it 5 ...”

“I tried this last night and overindulged by accident. Didn't think a sati and would hit as hard as this one did in the Stoney feeling I got. I'm not an everyday smoker so my tolerance isn't as high as some. I don't feel swag weed anymore really but I still have a  medium tolerance medicating 2-4 times a week. 4 bong hits made me puke. Smell pungent sour candy lemons. Taste was sour as well and a bit harsh on the exha...”
“Amazing High !”
“Very uplifting and happy feeling. good for daytime use. Not real stony but certainly takes the edge off.  And the lemon smell is devine.”
“Top producer of very potent weed.”
“Crazy head high. Makes you hella productive”
“Body high, tingly tongue, not too stupid, hard to type!  Fidgety.  I feel lovey-dovey.  Dry mouth.”
“Short but amazing high”
“Wonderful smell .Great taste!!!  thc tested at 27.made me feel motivated”
“Although this was a good, creative high, I found this time around I wasn't able to maintain my energy level.  After a short while I would lose interest in what I'm doing.  Need to try it again.”
“Ive smoked this a few times now by myself and with friends always a happy, giggly and chatty high. a super nice sativa”

“Such an amazing strain, as soon as I smoked it my adhd mindset shifted, I instantly felt happy and motivated And best of all no red eyes or munchies. This strain is all around lovely and tastes sweet.”

“A heave hitter for sure. All around, this strain is amazing and reminded me what it was like to get high qhen I was younger...
Trippy.”

“Very energetic, buzzy high. This is a good morning strain for me, and it's pretty intense. It's fairly clear-headed, but there were moments where I got lost in thought. Overall, a good strain that helped with my depression.”

“Energetic and buzzy head high, with a slight tingly sensation in the ends of the limbs. Made me feel content and happy, with just a hint of anxiousness at the very onset of the high. Nothing horrible though. Found this strain to be a good morning one, and definitely helped with depression symptoms.”
“Taste very good and smells amazing!!”
“smooth taste..”
“Very very strong nice taste”

“Lemon, lime and pine, sweet candy bubblegum. Definitely a functional high.  Lots of thoughts running through my head and feeling the creativity to make a bunch of stuff. Probably good for ADD I would imagine.”
“Great strain it took 1 or 2 hits to really get you high, makes you think overall it's a good strain”
“Local Co-Op started carrying this strain. Heavy sativa; good for hiking. i prefer its taste but you may not so smell it!”
“The taste is a little harsh, but for the high it gives I can live with it. A nice, long lasting high”
“Super sticky, rolls great. Really nice uplifting high. Super great strain.”

“Just picked up a half of some golden crystally nugs of lemony goodness. Exceptional high. I dabbed mad hard on rosin and bho yesterday and took a couple hits of jack this morning and wow, higher than I was yesterday. Super cozy high, but definitely energetic.”
“I Love thus Strain”
“love jtr first tried in high school. it hits my head right off first few hits making me anxious and kinda relaxed.”

“You get up, get ready to leave your spot and you realized you have been zoned out for a while and you are just like shit I'm high af. You start lagging like a mf and time seems so slow, visually too with the lags. About 30 minutes later once the lag wears off it's really enjoyable not too heavy your happy uplifted and just having a great time but it all comes in stages. Munchies aren't too bad but you still pretty hu...”

“great strain , not really a heavy hitting sativa but it definitely keeps you up and going with high energy. taste is great , smell is even better, I'd definetly smoke this for a month striaght no problem.”
“love this preroll, the name says a lot.  it will get ya ripped lol. helps me be active and around people. it's a must try! like to get this in the flower form. highly recommended.”
“Decent as fuck”

“This shit was awesome! The buds were very sticky and sort of matted looking but they were crystally as all Niffleheim and they were very turquoise blue. It literally almost knocked me out. I had to lay down very quickly or else gravity would have done it for me. Be careful with this stuff.”
“High sneaks up onto you. The effects were not very strong. Average strain IMO.”
“Very heady.”

“very high and thc and very nice flavor. it's like a sweet sugar pine smell. will not make you as tired out or as foggy feeling as other strains. it stretches so you may way to top or LST. not a big yielder but the potency and amazing flavor make up for it.”
“jack the ripper gets me grooving”

“I'm pretty cerebral and active and prefer sativas. This here is nice: it came on slow. I hit my pipe a couple of times, took a little break, then hit it again. The high rolled in like a big wave of light water. I feel brilliant, euphoric. This is great for my depression, and it energizes me -- gives me not only ideas but the energy to make them happen. I can't see trying to take a nap right now; this isn't a bedtime ...”
“This strain is definitely one of my favorites. Hits hard and smells wonderful.”
“Great strain, great high just didn't seem to last very long”
“This strain makes me feel creative and energetic then mellows out to nice buzz and relaxation.”
“This strain is awesome! I felt awake and felt energetic. I did felt spacey with this strain but not enough to glue you to the couch it was a good uplifting feeling. I definitely enjoy this strain.”
“Awesome aroma and flavor. This is definitely killer cannabis for a reason. Provides an instant head buzz and body high that leaves you in a couch lock”

“After a couple hours, I started to notice some effects on my blood sugar.  I felt like my blood sugar was low and my heart was beating really fast.  This same thing happened last night after I smoked a different sativa so i'm not sure if it's something going on with me or I am having this sort of reaction to sativa dominant strains.”
“if you wanna get so physically fatigued that a hot day makes you vomit in waves and leave you with a fantom pain in your abdomen like you have a tapeworm, then this is the shit for you!”
“Great high still felt energetic to do things but did also experience paranoid and dry mouth.”

“Jack the ripper is one of those creeper sativa strains, although its not lemon tasting more of the skunk taste and flavor for this one. It still has a nice warm an uplifting feel to it. It's great if you're a mess and can't seem to find a starting point. It has a golden memory feeling its like revisiting a wonderful place again there are memories that stick with us forever. Jack is great if you can't seem to open you...”
“Very good strain!”
“One of my all time favorite Sativa's, haven't had it in a while but always a good strain to use.”
“ducky stain ever”

“It's unfortunate, but JTR does nothing for me. I have tried and tried to no avail. I will not be getting this strain again - EVER! I can't blame the dispensary for it, I'm just guessing it's not going to work for me and never will. Oh well, it's back to Durban Poison during the day from now on and Granddaddy Purple at night.”
“I usually love Jack's, but this put me right to sleep, even after a few uses. Felt like a heavy indica instead of sativa hybrid.”
“nice but so many others to try”
“tried it as a shatter" from monarch Scottsdale. disappointed by the color of product but overall good quality smoke. Has a Candy after taste. Will not buy again”"

“The smell is good, not so strong that it permeates everything. Like the taste compared to other earthy strains but I did try the shake which may have something to do with it. The feeling is euphoric! Literally! Love the high it gives while also keeping me up and moving for day time activities.”
“This one made me so dizzy after 3 hits. I thought I was gonna throw up. I felt kinda sick.”
“It gives me bad bad anxiety and I feel like I'm dying....”
“Tested 16% thc, not much of a unique flavor the usual weed flavor, cant say much of the high, nothing spectacular.”
“midgradeee”
“An alright strain, wasnt grown too well in this particular batch”
“So so...not a very intense high”
“Great strain, love the taste and smell. Long high sort of reminds me of blue dream or something like that. Puts you in a good hazy state.”
